steps.description: Talk to Bailey Stonemantle and withdraw Kravel's Scheme, Sample Elven Gem, Perenolde Tiara (If you have it), and Tomes of Alterac (If you have it) from your bank
Talk to Binjy Featherwhistle and train Mechanostrider Piloting. Talk to Milli Featherwhistle and buy a Mechanostrider
Talk to Veron Amberstill and buy a Ram. Talk to Ultham Ironhorn and train Ram Riding
Talk to Briarthorn and train your class spells
Talk to Fenthwick and train your class spells
Talk to Toldren Deepiron and train your class spells
Talk to Dink and train your class spells
Talk to Brandur Ironhammer and train your class spells
Talk to Jubahl Corpseseeker. Buy Grimoires for your pets
Talk to Regnus Thundergranite and train your class spells
Talk to Bilban Tosslespanner and train your class spells
Talk to Belia Thundergranite. Ensure your pets Frost Resistance is maxed
Enter the Deeprun Tram. Take the tram to Stormwind. Level your First Aid if needed while waiting for the tram

tips.text: Level your First Aid if needed while waiting for the tram

steps.description: Talk to Count Remington Ridgewell and turn in The Perenolde Tiara
Talk to Milton Sheaf and turn in Return to Milton
Talk to High Sorcerer Andromath and accept Vital Supplies
Abandon The Perenolde Tiara
Talk to Angus Stern and accept A Meal Served Cold

tips.text: This is a 30 minute timed quest. You must not logout during this time otherwise the quest will fail

steps.description: Talk to Innkeeper Allison. Set your Hearthstone to Stormwind
Talk to Dungar Longdrink and fly to Westfall
Travel to the Rebel Camp
Talk to Brother Nimetz and accept Kurzen's Mystery
Talk to Lieutenant Doren and accept Colonel Kurzen
Talk to Hemet Nesingwary and accept Raptor Mastery. Talk to Sir S. J. Erlgadin and accept Panther Mastery
Kill Cold Eye Basilisks. Loot them for the Chilled Basilisk Haunch
Hearth to Stormwind
Talk to Angus Stern and turn in A Meal Served Cold
Talk to Archbishop Benedictus and accept Bring the Light
Talk to Dungar Longdrink and fly to Booty Bay
Talk to Fleet Master Seahorn and turn in Sunken Treasure
Talk to Catelyn the Blade inside the Inn, turn in Ansirem's Key, and accept Pretty Boy Duncan
Talk to Crank Fizzlebub and turn in Back to Booty Bay
Take the Boat to Ratchet
Talk to Bragok and fly to Thalanaar
Talk to Myriam Moonsinger and accept A Host of Evil
Kill Razorfen Battleguards, Razorfen Thornweavers and Death's Head Cultists

tips.text: This quest is completed outside of the Instance

steps.description: Talk to Myriam Moonsinger and turn in A Host of Evil
Enter Razorfen Downs
Talk to Belnistrasz, turn in Scourge of the Downs, and accept Extinguishing the Idol

tips.text: Take the left path and stick left the entire way until you reach The Murder Pens to get to Belnistrasz
Do not accept Extinguishing the Idol until the rest of your party is ready as this begins the escort. Auto accept has been turned off for this step

steps.description: Follow and protect Belnistrasz during his ritual
Click Belnistrasz's Brazier and turn in Extinguishing the Idol
Kill Amnennar the Coldbringer
Hearth to Stormwind
Talk to Archbishop Benedictus and turn in Bring the Light

Check your bank for any missing Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Pages and buy any that you still need from the Auction House. Place any newly bought Pages into your bank. Skip this step if you aren't able to aquire them

tips.text: Chapter.1 requires: Pages 1,4,6,8
Chapter.2 requires: Pages 10,11,14,16
Chapter.3 requires: Pages 18,20,21,24
Chapter.4 requires: Pages 25,26,27

steps.description: Talk to Dungar Longdrink and fly to Booty Bay
Talk to Kebok and accept Skullsplitter Tusks
Talk to Krazek, turn in Favor for Krazek, and accept Return to Corporal Kaleb
Talk to Krazek and accept Return to Corporal Kaleb
Talk to Fleet Master Seahorn and turn in Sunken Treasure
Talk to Catelyn the Blade inside the Inn, turn in Ansirem's Key, and accept Pretty Boy Duncan
Talk to Crank Fizzlebub and accept Venture Company Mining
Talk to Crank Fizzlebub and turn in Back to Booty Bay
Talk to Innkeeper Skindle. Set your Hearthstone to Booty Bay
Talk to Privateer Bloads and accept Akiris by the Bundle
Talk to Sea Wolf MacKinley and accept Scaring Shaky
Talk to Drizzlik and accept Excelsior
Talk to First Mate Crazz and accept The Bloodsail Buccaneers
Click the Bloodsail Correspondence on top of the barrel and turn in The Bloodsail Buccaneers. Accept The Bloodsail Buccaneers
Kill Pretty Boy Duncan. Loot him for Catelyn's Blade
Talk to First Mate Crazz, turn in The Bloodsail Buccaneers, and accept The Bloodsail Buccaneers
Talk to Catelyn the Blade, turn in Pretty Boy Duncan, and accept The Curse of the Tides
Talk to Deeg and accept Up to Snuff
Talk to Fleet Master Seahorn and turn in The Bloodsail Buccaneers
Talk to Dizzy One-Eye and accept Keep An Eye Out
Kill Elder Mistvale Gorillas. Loot them for their Mistvale Giblets and Gorilla Fangs

tips.text: Save the Gorilla Fangs for a later quest

steps.description: Kill Jungle Stalkers
Kill Venture Co. Foremen, Venture Co. Surveyors, Venture Co. Strip Miners and Venture Co. Tinkerers. Loot them for their Singing Blue Crystals
Click on Bookie Herod's Records upstairs in the house, turn in Bookie Herod, and accept The Hidden Key
Enter The Stockpile (Kurzen's Cave)
Click Bookie Herod's Strongbox on the ground, turn in The Hidden Key, and accept The Spy Revealed!
Kill Kurzen Elites, Kurzen Subchiefs, and Colonel Kurzen. Loot him for his Head
Talk to Lieutenant Doren and turn in Colonel Kurzen
Talk to Corporal Kaleb and turn in Return to Corporal Kaleb
Talk to Lieutenant Doren, turn in The Spy Revealed!, and accept Patrol Schedules
Talk to Corporal Sethman, turn in Patrol Schedules, and accept Report to Doren
Talk to Lieutenant Doren and turn in Report to Doren
Talk to Hemet Nesingwary, turn in Raptor Mastery, and accept Raptor Mastery
Abandon Colonel Kurzen
Open the Moon Over the Vale. Loot it for The First Troll Legend
Open The Emperor's Tomb. Loot it for The Fourth Troll Legend
Open the Fall of Gurubashi. Loot it for The Third Troll Legend
Kill a Elder Saltwater Crocolisk. Loot it for its Elder Crocolisk Skin
Open Gri'lek the Wanderer underwater. Loot it for The Second Troll Legend

tips.text: PAY CLOSE ATTENTION TO YOUR BREATH BAR

steps.description: Use Catelyn's Blade on the Altar of the Tides underwater to summon Gazban. Kill Gazban. Loot him for the Stone of the Tides

tips.text: Use Catelyn's Blade on the Altar of the Tides underwater to summon Gazban

steps.description: Talk to Brother Nimetz, turn in Kurzen's Mystery, and accept Troll Witchery
Hearth to Booty Bay. Buy food/water if needed
Hearth to Booty Bay. Buy food if needed
Talk to Crank Fizzlebub and turn in Venture Company Mining
Talk to Fleet Master Seahorn and accept The Bloodsail Buccaneers. Talk to Baron Revilgaz and turn in The Curse of the Tides
Talk to Viznik or Rickle and withdraw any Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Pages you found and Khadgar's Essays on Dimensional Convergence (If you have it) from your bank
Talk to Viznik or Rickle and deposit Gorilla Fangs (If you have any) into your bank
Talk to Auctioneer O'reely. Buy any Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Pages you are missing. Skip this step if you aren't able to aquire them
Talk to Shaky Phillipe and turn in Scaring Shaky
Talk to Shaky Phillipe, turn in Scaring Shaky, and accept Return to MacKinley
Talk to Sea Wolf MacKinley and turn in Return to MacKinley
Talk to Drizzlik and turn in Excelsior

Kill the Bloodsail. Loot them for their Snuff and Dizzy's Eye. Kill Bloodsail Swashbucklers and loot the Bloodsail Charts and Bloodsail Orders. These can spawn randomly at one of the camps or in the small rowboat
Travel to The Cape of Stranglethorn
Click The Holy Spring. Loot it for the Holy Spring Water
Kill Naga Explorers. Loot them for their Akiris Reeds
Kill Tethis. Loot him for his Talon

tips.text: Tethis will patrol around in this location

steps.description: Kill Jungle Stalkers until you are level 43
Kill any Skullsplitter Troll. Loot them for their Skullsplitter Tusks. Kill Skullsplitter Mystics and Skullsplitter Witch Doctors. Loot them for their Skullsplitter Fetishes
Kill Bhag'thera. Loot him for the Fang of Bhag'thera

tips.text: Bhag'thera can spawn north or west of the Mosh'Ogg Ogre Mound
Cast Eagle Eye to try and locate Bhag'thera

steps.description: Travel to Nesingwary's Expedition
Talk to Sir S. J. Erlgadin and turn in Panther Mastery. Talk to Hemet Nesingwary, turn in Raptor Mastery, and accept Big Game Hunter
Talk to Barnil Stonepot. Turn in all your Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Pages. Skip this step if you don't have all the Green Hills of Stranglethorn - Chapters
Kill King Bangalash. Loot him for the Head of Bangalash

tips.text: Use the Flash Bomb on King Bangalash when he is at 55%
King Bangalash will spawn 2 Panthers at 50% health. Try to CC him just before 50% if possible so it prevents him from spawning any

steps.description: Talk to Hemet Nesingwary and turn in Big Game Hunter
Talk to Brother Nimetz and turn in Troll Witchery
Travel north into Duskwood, then west towards Westfall
Talk to Grimbooze Thunderbrew, accept Sweet Amber, turn in Sweet Amber, and accept Sweet Amber
Talk to Thor and fly to Duskwood
